entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
